Meeting Codes

  • X = Closed Meeting (alcoholics only)
  • O = Open Meeting (all welcome)
  • YP= Young People (all welcome)
  • BB = Big Book Study
  • S = Speaker Meeting
  • SS = Step Study
  • W = Women's Meeting
  • M = Men's Meeting
  • Bg = Beginner's Meeting
  • SP = Spanish Speaking
